PIREP <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Dec2018/WindsDec18]]> Flight Management System Wind Inputs and Blending
Adding wind data to a flight plan improves fuel burn and ETA predictions... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Dec2018/WindsDec18]]> Required Navigation Performance – Authorization Required (RNP AR) <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Dec2018/RNPValidationDec18]]> Approach Validation
Operators flying RNP-AR approaches require additional quality checks in the handling of navigation database, training, and regulatory oversight... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Dec2018/RNPValidationDec18]]>
